_sText:
Hi, this is my first ever map with Hammer
And feedback welcome! just leave a comment.

Shout out to fedda for the help!

Just go upto the doors and push your use button to open the doors, the buttons failed so they were removed.

also with the pic the 2 spawns are opposite and then the 2 hexagons / "pods" on the right and left are the bomb sites.

One last thing lighting has changed a bit since the screenshots, all the rest is the same, the map now has a Light_enviroment and lights to illuminate it rather than just a env_sun which is still there. 

And possitions of lights will change when i get some free time
